text: Baidu Library Privacy Policy
You are welcome to use the services provided by Baidu Library!
Baidu (this privacy policy refers to Beijing Baidu Net News Technology Co., Ltd., also known as "we") attaches great importance to your privacy protection and personal information protection.
This privacy policy is suitable for access and use of various services provided by Baidu Library in any way.

You can implement information query, document browsing, audio, watching videos, voice speed memo, picture transfers, document introduction, shopping/payment, social and concern, download files, login/registration Baidu account and other services(The following is collectively referred to as "Baidu Library Products or Services").
We will only handle personal information you need to use products or services.

This privacy policy is suitable for you through the Baidu library web page, mobile terminals (including but not limited to APP, applet), software development tool packs (SDK) for third -party websites and applications, and application programming interfaces (API), etc.Let's access and use our products and services.
Baidu library includes but not limited to multiple application versions such as iOS and Android. Please choose a version that matches the installed terminal equipment when using the Baidu library.
The personal information that Baidu Library may get depends on the Baidu Library application version you use, the specific type/version of the terminal equipment you use, and the functions you use.

This privacy policy aims to help you understand which personal information we will collect, why these personal information is collected, what these personal information will use what these personal information do and how to protect these personal information.

We will follow your personal information in accordance with your personal information, but we will not collect all your personal information in a compulsory binding method just because you authorize the consent of the privacy policy.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We will not collect all your personal information in a compulsory binding method just because you authorize your consent of the privacy policy.

text: We will solicit your separate consent in strict accordance with the requirements of laws and regulations.

In addition to this privacy policy, we may also explain the rules of our personal information through product page notifications, pop -ups prompts, information push, etc.The specific rules have the same effect as the privacy policy.
label: Important
rewrite: In addition to this privacy policy, we may also explain the rules of handling your personal information through product page notifications, pop -ups prompts, and information push.

text: Unless laws and administrative regulations have other provisions, in response to how we handle your personal information, you have the right to know and decide, and have the right to restrict or reject us or other parties to deal with your personal information;
label: Important
rewrite: You enjoy the right to know and decide, have the right to restrict or reject us or other parties to deal with your personal information.

text: At the same time, you have the right to ask us to explain to the personal information processing rules we provide.
label: Important
rewrite: You have the right to ask us to explain the personal information processing rules we provide.

text: Please read and understand the privacy policy carefully before using Baidu Library and related products and services to make appropriate choices.
This privacy policy will help you understand the following:
1. The information we collect and the corresponding purpose of the use
2. How do we use cookies and similar technologies
3. How do we share, transfer, open disclosure, and entrust your personal information
4. How do we save and protect your personal information
5. Your rights
6. How do we deal with the personal information of minors
7. How to cross -border transfer of your personal information
8. How to update this policy
9. How to contact us
We know the importance of personal information to you, and also know that effective protection for your information is the cornerstone of our business healthy and sustainable development.
Thank you for your use and trust in Baidu Library!

We are committed to maintaining your trust in us, abiding by the following principles, and protecting your personal information: the principles of consistency and responsibility, the principles of clear purpose, the principle of choice, at least the principle of safety, the principles of safety, the principle of subject participation, the principle of openness and transparency, etc.Essence
label: Important
rewrite: We abide by the principles of consistent and responsibilities, the principles of clear purpose, the principle of consent, the minimum principles, the principles of ensuring safety, the principles of subject participation, and the principle of openness and transparency to protect your personal information.

text: We solemnly promise that we will take corresponding security protection measures to protect your personal information in accordance with the mature safety standards of the industry.
1. The information we collect and the corresponding purpose of the use
We will follow the principles of legitimate, correct, and necessary to collect and use your personal information.
Specifically, we collect and process your personal information for your corresponding business functions.

In the corresponding features, if you provide personal information of others, please make sure that you have obtained the authorization of the relevant subject, we reserved the right to check the legal source of these personal information at any time.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If you provide personal information of others, please make sure that you have obtained the authorization of the relevant subject.

label: First Party Collection Information

text: You refuse to provide such expansion business functions, which will not affect your basic business functions, but if you refuse to provide personal information necessary for implementing the function of expanding business functions, we will not be able to provide you with expanded business functions.

2. How do we use cookies and similar technologies
Cookie and anonymous identifier tool.
Cookie is a mechanism that supports the server (or script) to store and retrieve information on the client.
When you use the Baidu library product or service, we will send one or more cookie or anonymous identifiers to your device.
When you interact with the Baidu Library service, we allow cookie or anonymous identifiers to send to Baidu's server.
Cookie usually contains identifiers, site names, and some numbers and characters.

Using Cookie technology, Baidu can understand your habits, remember your preferences, save your steps to enter duplicate information, provide you with more thoughtful personalized services, or help you judge the security of your account.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: Use cookie technology to learn about your habits, remember your preferences, and save your steps to enter duplicate information.

text: Cookie can also help us statistical traffic information, analyze the effectiveness of page design and advertising.
We will not use Cookie for any purpose outside the purpose of this policy.
You can manage or delete Cookie according to your preferences.
For details, see aboutcookies.org.
You can clear all the functions saved on the computer, cookies, and most of the network browsers have the functions of stopping, cookies.
label: Important
rewrite: You can clear all the cookies saved on the computer.

text: But if you do this, you need to change the user settings when you visit our website, but you may not be able to log in or use the services or functions provided by Baidu that depend on Cookie because of these modifications.

text: 4. How do we save and protect your personal information
4.1. Save period

We will save your personal information within the time limit for providing the service, but the laws and regulations have other regulations on the period of preservation, you agree to retain longer periods, ensure the safety and quality of services, achieve disputed purpose, and technically difficult to achieve technically achieved the purpose of solving disputes.Under the circumstances, after the foregoing period of preservation expires, we will extend the storage period in accordance with the law, according to law, or within a reasonable range.
label: Data Retention
Important

text: After exceeding the storage period, we will delete your personal information or perform anonymous processing in accordance with the law.
label: Data Retention
Important
rewrite: After exceeding the storage period, we will delete your personal information or perform anonymous processing in accordance with the law.

text: 4.2. Save area
In principle, the personal information we collected and generated in the territory of the People's Republic of China will be stored in the territory of the People's Republic of China.
label: Data Retention
Important

text: If your personal information may be transferred to the overseas jurisdiction of your country or the country/region, or by the interview from these jurisdictions, we will strictly fulfill the obligations stipulated in the laws and regulations and obtain you in accordance with the laws and regulations.Agree alone.

Important

text: There may be different data protection laws in such jurisdictions, and no relevant laws are set up.

In such circumstances, we will transmit your personal information in accordance with the provisions of the current laws of China, and will ensure that your personal information is sufficiently protected in the People's Republic of China.
label: Data Retention
Important
rewrite: We will transmit your personal information in accordance with the provisions of the current laws of Chinese and ensure that your personal information is sufficiently protected in the territory.

text: For example, we will ask you to agree to cross -border transfer of personal information, or implement security measures such as data to identify data before cross -border data transfer.

Important
Data Security
rewrite: We will ask you to agree to cross -border transfer of personal information, or implement security measures such as data to identify data before cross -border data transfer.

text: 4.3. Safety measures

(1), we will collect, use, store and transmit user information with the "minimum" principle, and inform you the purpose and scope of the relevant information through user agreements and privacy policies.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We will collect, use, store, and transmit user information with the "minimization" principle, and inform the purpose and scope of the use of information.

text: (2) We attach great importance to information security.

We have set up a specialized team responsible for research and development and application of multiple security technologies and procedures. We will conduct a security background review of the person in charge of safety management and key safety positions. We have established a comprehensive information security management system and internal security incident disposal mechanismwait.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: The establishment of a specialized team is responsible for the research and development and application of multiple security technologies and procedures, the safety background review of the person in charge of safety management and key safety positions, establishing a sound information security management system and internal security incident disposal mechanism.

text: We will adopt appropriate security measures and technical means to storage and protect your personal information that meets industry standards to prevent your information from being lost, being disclosed, use, damage, lost or leaked by unauthorized access, public disclosure, use, damage, loss, or leakage.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Take security measures and technical means to store and protect your personal information to prevent your information from being lost, being interviewed, publicly disclosed, used, damaged, lost, or leaked.

text: We will take all reasonable and feasible measures to protect your personal information.
We will use encryption technology to ensure the confidentiality of the data;
We will use a trusted protection mechanism to prevent data from being maliciously attacked.
(3), we will conduct data security consciousness training and assessment of data security, and strengthen employees' awareness of protecting the importance of personal information.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Perform data security training and assessment of employees, and strengthen employees' understanding of the importance of personal information.

text: We will perform identity authentication and authority control to employees who handle personal information, and sign a confidentiality agreement with employees and partners who are in contact with your personal information to clarify job responsibilities and code of conduct to ensure that only authorized personnel can access personal information.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: The employees who handle personal information have identified authentication and permission control and signed a confidentiality agreement with them.

text: If there is an act of violating the confidentiality agreement, it will be immediately terminated with the cooperative relationship with Baidu, and will be held accountable for relevant legal responsibilities. It also puts forward confidentiality requirements for personnel in contact with personal information when leaving the post.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Persons who violate the confidentiality agreement will be held legal and responsible, and put forward confidentiality requirements for those who come into contact with personal information when they leave.

text: (4) We remind you that the Internet is not an absolutely secure environment. When you interact with other users through the third -party social software, emails, SMS, etc. in the Baidu libraryWhether the three -party software's transmission of information is completely encrypted to ensure the security of your personal information.

(5) We also ask you to understand that due to the technical restrictions and rapid development of the Internet industry, and various malicious attack methods that may exist, even if we do our best to strengthen security measures, it is impossible to ensure 100 % security of information.
Please understand that the system and communication network you used when using our products and/or services may have security problems in other links other than our control.

(6) According to our security management system, personal information leakage, damage or loss incidents are listed as the most major security incidents. Once the company is launched, the company's highest -level emergency plan will occur.The department formed a joint emergency response team treatment.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: A joint emergency response team such as the Ministry of Security, the Ministry of Public Affairs, and the Ministry of Legal Affairs handles personal information security incidents.

text: 4.4. Safety event notice

(1), we will formulate emergency plans for cyber security incidents, timely dispose of security risks such as system vulnerabilities, computer viruses, cyber attacks, and network invasion. When incidents that harm to cyber security occur, we will immediately start the emergency plan and take corresponding remedies.The measures report to the relevant authorities in accordance with regulations.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: When incidents that are harmful to network security, we will immediately launch an emergency plan, take corresponding remedial measures, and report to the relevant authorities in accordance with regulations.

text: (2) Personal information leakage, damage, and loss belong to the company -level super -large security incident. We will be responsible for regularly organizing working group members to conduct safety plan exercises to prevent such security incidents from occur.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We will be responsible for regularly organizing working group members to conduct safety plan drills.

text: Once unfortunately, we will start emergency plans in accordance with the highest priority to form an emergency emergency group to trace the causes and reduce losses in the shortest time.
label: Data Security

text: (3) After the personal information security incident occurs unfortunately, we will inform you the basic situation and possible impact of the security incident in accordance with the requirements of the laws and regulations.Suggestions for risks, remedy measures, etc.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: If a personal information security incident occurs, we will inform your basic situation, possible impact, disposal measures, independent prevention suggestions, etc.

text: We will promptly tell you the incident -related situation in the site notification, SMS notification, telephone, email, etc. Informing you, it is difficult to inform you one by one, we will publish a reasonable and effective way to publish an announcement.
At the same time, we will also actively report to the disposal of personal information security incidents in accordance with the requirements of the regulatory authorities.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Report the disposal of personal information security incidents in accordance with the requirements of the regulatory authorities.

text: Please understand that according to the provisions of laws and regulations, if the measures we take can effectively avoid information leakage, tampering, and loss, causing harm, unless the regulatory authorities ask you to notify you, we can choose not to notify you information security incidents.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: If it can effectively avoid information leakage, tampering, or loss, we can choose not to notify you the information security incident, unless the regulatory authorities have other requirements.

Cessation of Operations
rewrite: When stopping operations, we will notify you to stop collecting your personal information and delete or delete your personal information.

text: 5.8. Get the right to explain
You have the right to ask us to explain the personal information processing rules.
label: Important
rewrite: You have the right to ask us to explain the personal information processing rules.

text: You can get in contact with us through the contact information in part 8
5.9. Show and control of personalized content
5.9.1. Exhibition and control of personalized content

If you don't want to receive related personalized content for you based on your interest preferences, you can use [Mine]-[Settings]-[Privacy Settings]-[Recommended settings]-[Personalized recommendation] Close personalized content recommendation recommendation recommendationEssence
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: You can use [Mine]-[Settings]-[Privacy Settings]-[Recommended settings]-[Personalized recommendation] Close personalized content recommendation.

text: When you choose to close the personalized content recommendation, you cannot enjoy personalized recommendation services. We will show you the content based on non -personalized factors such as content heat. You may see what you are not interested in or even dislikes.Experience may be affected.
label: Important
rewrite: When you choose to close the recommendation of personalized content, we will show you the content based on non -personalized factors such as content heat.

text: 5.10. Exception of rights exercise
In the following circumstances, we may not be able to respond to your inspection, correction and supplementation, deletion, copying, and request for carrying, knowing, knowing, and deciding:
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: In the following circumstances, we may not be able to respond to your inspection, correction and supplementation, deletion, copying, and request for carrying, knowing, knowing, and deciding:

text: (1), directly related to national security and national defense security;
label: Edit/Control
Important

text: (2) Directly related to public safety, public health, and major public interests;
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: Your request is directly related to public safety, public health, and major public interests and may not be responded.

text: (3), directly related to criminal investigation, prosecution, trial, and execution judgment;
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: Your request is related to criminal investigation, prosecution, and trial, and may not be responded.

text: (4), we have sufficient evidence that you have subjective malice or abuse of rights (such as your request will endanger public safety and the legitimate rights and interests of others, or your request exceeds the scope of general technical means and commercial costs);
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: If we have sufficient evidence that the subject of personal information has subjective malice or abuse of rights, we may not be able to respond to requests.

text: (5) In response to the request of the subject of personal information, the legitimate rights and interests of you or other individuals and organizations will be severely damaged;
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: We may not be able to respond to requests that exceed the storage range, exceed the reasonable limit, or the legitimate rights and interests of personal information subjects or other individuals and organizations will be seriously damaged.

text: (6), involved business secrets;
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: We may not be able to respond.

text: (7) There are other provisions of laws and administrative regulations.
5.11. How to respond to your rights request
To ensure safety, you may need to provide a written request or prove your identity in other ways.
We may ask you to verify your identity first, and then process your request.
After verification, we will respond within 15 working days.
If you are not satisfied, you can also contact us through [Customer Service Hotline: 4009217005].

text: 6. How do we deal with the personal information of minors
Baidu attaches great importance to the protection of minors' information.
Our products and services are mainly adults.
We will only process minor personal information under the consent of laws and regulations, parents or other guardians.
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: We will only process minor personal information under the consent of laws and regulations, parents or other guardians.

text: If you are a minor under the age of 14, before using Baidu's library products and services, you should ask your parents or other guardians to read it carefully, or carefully read the privacy under the supervision and guidance of your parents or other guardians under the guidance and guidancePolicies and the "Professional Information Protection Statement on Baidu Children", and use our products and services under the consent of your parents or other guardians, or provide us with information.
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: If you are a child under the age of 14, please read privacy policies with your guardian and use services or information under the consent and guidance of the guardian.

label: Specific Audiences
First Party Collection Information

label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: If the guardian finds that we have collected personal information of minors without obtaining consent, please contact us to delete.

text: 7. Revision of privacy policy
Our privacy policy may change.
Without your clear consent, we will not reduce the rights you should enjoy in accordance with this privacy policy.
We will post any changes to this privacy policy on this page.
For major changes, we will notify you in the main exposure page or in -site exposure pages or in -site letters or sending emails or other appropriate ways to reach you.
If you do not agree with such changes, please stop using Baidu library products and services immediately.
label: Important
rewrite: If you do not agree with the change of privacy policy, please stop using Baidu Library products and services immediately.

text: The major changes in this policy include, but not limited to:
(1) Our service model has changed significantly.
Such as the purpose of handling personal information, the type of personal information, the use of personal information, etc.;
(2) We have undergone major changes in the aspects of ownership structure and organizational structure.
Such as changes caused by business adjustments, bankruptcy mergers and acquisitions, etc.
(3) The main objects provided, transferred or disclosed to the outside world change;
(4) The right to participate in personal information processing and its exercise methods have changed significantly;
(5) When we are responsible for handling the responsibility departments, contact methods and complaint channels of personal information security;
(6) Evaluation report on personal information security impact indicates that there is a high risk.
If there is no such thing as a privacy policy, the "Baidu Privacy Protection Statement" shall prevail.

Attachment: term explanation

Personal information refers to the various information related to the recognized or recognizable natural person recorded in electronics or other methods, excluding information after anonymous processing.

Personal information includes names, date of birth, ID number, personal biometric information, address, communication and communication contact information, communication records and content, account password, property information, credit information, travel information, accommodation information, health and physiological information, transactions, transactions, transactionsInformation, etc.

Personal sensitive information refers to personal information that can easily cause the personality and dignity of natural persons to be infringed or harmed by personal and property security, including biometrics, religious beliefs, specific identities, medical health, financial accounts, trajectory trajectory and other information.And personal information under minor at the age of 14.
Device refers to devices that can be used to use Baidu products and/or services, such as desktop devices, tablets or smartphones.

Equipment information includes device attribute information you use to install and run the Baidu library equipment (such as hardware models, operating system versions, international mobile device identity code IMEI, network device hardware address MAC, anonymous device logo OAID, Android ID and so on.Equipment identifier), device connection information (telecommunications operator, WIFI information), and equipment status information (device application installation list, equipment sensor information).

Log information refers to the requests that our server automatically records your requests when visiting Baidu Library, such as your IP address, the type of browser and the language of the use of hardware equipment, the version of the operating system, the information of the network operator, the information of the network operatorThe date, time, and length of your access to the service are provided, formed or reserved when you use our products or services.

Cookie refers to a mechanism that supports the server (or script) to store and retrieve information on the client. By adding a simple and persistent client state to expand the web -based client/server application.
The server sends a status information while returning the HTTP object to the client, and is stored by the client.
The state information shows the effective URL range in this state.
Since then, the HTTP request within this range initiated by the client will return the current value of the status information from the client to the server. This state information is called Cookie.

User portraits refer to analysis or predictions of personal characteristics of a certain natural person through collecting, gathering, and analyzing personal information, such as their occupations, economy, health, education, personal preferences, credit, behavior, etc., to form their personal characteristic modelEssence
Use personal information of specific natural persons to form a characteristic model of the natural person, called direct user portraits.
The use of personal information from specific natural persons, such as the data of its group, forms a characteristic model of the natural person, called indirect user portraits.
Decoration refers to the process of processing personal information, so that it cannot recognize a specific natural person without using additional information.
Anonymous refers to the process that the personal information subject cannot be recognized by the technical processing of personal information, and the processing information cannot be restored.
The information obtained by personal information after anonymous processing does not belong to personal information.

Baidu platform refers to the special channels or platform services of Baidu Company (including Baidu search, Baidu APP and derivative version, Baidu Encyclopedia, Baidu Tieba, Baidu mobile assistant and other Baidu products https://www.baidu.com/more/) and other websites, programs, services, tools and clients.

A related company refers to the single name or collective name of the operator of Baidu Library Beijing Baidu Net News Technology Co., Ltd. and other companies that have related relationships with Baidu.

"Related relationship" refers to the subject (including individuals, companies, partnerships, organizations, or other entities), that is, the subject that directly or indirectly controls, or the subject that controls it directly or indirectlyMaster controlled by the same subject.

The aforementioned "control" means that through holding voting rights, contracts or other methods, directly or indirectly have the power or other relationships that instructions or instructions that to instructions to make instructions by others.
Thank you again for your trust and use of Baidu Library!
Beijing Baidu Net News Technology Co., Ltd.
